relation: Gets a copy of the DN of the parent of an entry.
Converts all characters in a DN to lowercase.
Determines if a DN is the suffix of the local database.
Determines if a DN is the suffix of the local database.
Determines if a DN is the parent of a specific DN.
Determines if a DN is the root DN for the local database.
Determines if a DN is equal to a specified suffix.
Converts a DN to canonical format.
Converts a DN to canonical format and all characters to lower case.
Normalizes part of a DN value.
Gets the DN of the parent of an entry.
Adds an RDN to a DN.
pageTitle: Part II Directory Server Plug-In API Reference (Sun Java System Directory Server Enterprise Edition 6.0 Developer's Guide)

textBeforeTable: Table 15–1 Quick Reference to Data Structures Quick Reference Tables This chapter covers data types and structures for use in plug-in functions. Table 15–1 summarizes the list of available data structures. Table 15–2 summarizes the list of callbacks. Chapter 15 Data Type and Structure Reference For help developing Directory Server plug-ins, read Part I, Directory Server Plug-In API Guide. Chapter 18, Parameter Block Reference covers the server parameter block holding data pertaining to a particular operation Chapter 17, Function Reference, Part II continues coverage of the plug-in API functions, in alphabetic order Chapter 16, Function Reference, Part I covers plug-in API functions, both by functional area and also in alphabetic order Chapter 15, Data Type and Structure Reference covers key data structures, not including the server parameter block This part includes the following chapters: The Directory Server plug-in API allows you to develop plug-ins, libraries registered with a Directory Server instance that customize and extend server capabilities. This part provides a complete reference to the API. Part II Directory Server Plug-In API Reference Next: Appendix A NameFinder Application Previous: Part I Directory Server Plug-In API Guide Sun Java System Directory Server Enterprise Edition
textAfterTable: Slapi_MatchingRuleEntry Matching rule handled by the plug-in  Slapi_Mod A modification to an individual attribute  Slapi_Mods Set of modifications to a directory entry  Slapi_Mutex Mutex for thread synchronization  Slapi_Operation Pending LDAP operation  Slapi_PBlock Parameter block containing LDAP operation data  Slapi_PluginDesc Plug-in description that you provide  Slapi_RDN Relative Distinguished Name  Slapi_Value Individual attribute value  Slapi_ValueSet Set of values of an attribute  vattr_type_thang Attribute that may be virtual  Table 15–2 Quick Reference to Callbacks Data Structure or Callback  Short Description
